patthana1.4:384.1_0: Nahetuyā soḷasa, naārammaṇe soḷasa, naadhipatiyā soḷasa, naanantare soḷasa, nasamanantare
patthana1.4:384.1_1: soḷasa, nasahajāte dvādasa, naaññamaññe dvādasa, nanissaye dvādasa, naupanissaye
patthana1.4:384.1_2: soḷasa, napurejāte cuddasa, napacchājāte soḷasa, naāsevane soḷasa, nakamme pannarasa,
patthana1.4:384.1_3: navipāke cuddasa, naāhāre soḷasa, naindriye soḷasa, najhāne soḷasa, namagge soḷasa,
patthana1.4:384.1_4: nasampayutte dvādasa, navippayutte dasa, noatthiyā dasa, nonatthiyā soḷasa, novigate
patthana1.4:386.1: Yathā kusalattike paccanīyagaṇanā vitthāritā, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
patthana1.4:388.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare
patthana1.4:388.1_1: satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta,
patthana1.4:388.1_2: naāsevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre satta, naindriye satta,
patthana1.4:388.1_3: najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.4:389.1: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe satta …pe… naaññamaññe tīṇi …pe… navipāke cattāri …pe… nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi …pe… novigate satta.
patthana1.4:390.1: (Yathā kusalattike anulomapaccanīyagaṇanā vitthāritā, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ. Asammohantena eso sajjhāyamaggo.)
patthana1.4:392.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta,
patthana1.4:392.1_1: sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi,
patthana1.4:392.1_2: pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme nava, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre satta, indriye nava,
patthana1.4:392.1_3: jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā
patthana1.4:393.1: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā adhipatiyā satta …pe… avigate terasa.
